animals.name: Buddy
animals.bio: Hello my name is Buddy! I'm neutered and good with dogs, cats, and kids. I also love people! My favorite thing to do is chasing tennis balls.

animals.name: Winston
animals.bio: Hi! My name is Winston! Tiny! Very playful with toys and people! Very affectionate, cuddly, and calm! Total lap dog! Fine with other dogs (not playful) and ignores cats!

animals.name: David Bowie
animals.bio: Hi! I’m (David) Bowie and I’m an incredibly playful pup! I am the most fun, affectionate, smart and cool little guy! I need to find a forever family with at least one other young playful dog (though the more the merrier!) and people who like to be active outdoors, taking walks or hikes or doing agility! Come and meet me, we will have so much fun together!!

animals.name: Adele and Taylor Swift
animals.bio: Hello! We are Adele (black) and Taylor Swift (tan) and we are the two cutest, sweetest dogs ever!

animals.name: Chester
animals.bio: Hi! My name is Chester and I am the happiest, most good-natured dog ever!!

animals.name: Sweetpea (formerly Cee Cee)
animals.bio: Hi! My name is Cee Cee and I am the happiest, most fun little girl around!

animals.name: Wally
animals.bio: Hi! My name is Wally, and I am a ridiculously happy, silly, fun loving 8 year old neutered male Black Lab Mix!

animals.name: Yoda
animals.bio: Hi-hi- hi! I'm so excited to meet you! And your friends! And everyone! I can’t contain how happy I am!

animals.name: Rooney
animals.breed: Border Collie mix (maybe mixed with spaniel)
animals.bio: Hi, my name is Rooney! I’m a beautiful, loving, and incredibly affectionate and deeply sweet boy!
